summary: Client (Sarah) requested starting a vision meeting. The PM asked for a project name; Architect, Developer, and QA did not provide comments (not addressed).

actions.task: Name the project and schedule the vision meeting; solicit input from Architect, Developer, and QA

backlog_deltas.title: Create vision meeting agenda and name the project

risks.risk: Key stakeholders (Architect, Developer, QA) did not provide input or were not addressed
risks.mitigation: Follow up directly with each role, set a clear deadline for input, and confirm availability before scheduling; circulate an agenda to encourage participation
